scripts.clean: if exist build rmdir /s /q build & if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator build/bundle.js --output dist/bundle.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --control-flow-flattening-threshold 0.75 --dead-code-injection true --dead-code-injection-threshold 0.4 --string-array true --string-array-encoding base64 --seed 12345
scripts.prepare:dist: npm run clean && if not exist dist mkdir dist && if not exist build mkdir build
scripts.build: npm run prepare:dist && npm run build:es && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html && node ./scripts/patch-html.js
